last_episode_to_air.name: #KThxBye
last_episode_to_air.overview: The gowns are on and the caps are about to be thrown, it's another Degrassi graduation. Zoe wonders how much support she'll get as she prepares to make her valedictory speech.

name: Degrassi: Next Class
overview: Follow a group of high school freshmen, sophomores, juniors, and seniors from Degrassi Community School, a fictional school in Toronto, Ontario, as they encounter some of the typical issues and challenges common to a teenager's life.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The Hollingsworth family must deal with the aftermath of the events of Degrassi’s Snow Ball that saw students forced into a school lockdown. Meanwhile, friendly pranking takes a very bad turn after the Degrassi girls volleyball team retaliates and goes too far against the rival team from Northern Tech. Also, favourite Degrassi alum are back and Student Body President Tristan will do whatever it takes to make the celebration an unforgettable one.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The season begins revealing the outcome of the devastating bus crash – many are injured and one student is left in critical condition. Degrassi opens its doors to an influx of Syrian refugees, but when some unexpected tensions arise, so do the student politics. Meanwhile, a post on Hastygram sparks a debate about social media etiquette and what is, or isn’t, appropriate to share publically.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The students return to school from their winter break, many for their final semester. Still reeling from the reality of Maya’s accident, Degrassi Community School is carefully monitoring everyone’s mental health and ensuring that all students have someone to talk to.

episodes.name: #BootyCall
episodes.overview: Tristan struggles to put his feelings aside while running for SC President against ex-boyfriend, Miles. Maya searches for a lead guitarist.

episodes.name: #NoFilter
episodes.overview: Zoe learns that Grace has a serious illness. Miles gets in trouble for venting about his mother’s new man, which leads him to express his anger towards restrictions in free speech.

episodes.name: #YesMeansYes
episodes.overview: Zig takes action to save his relationship and becomes physical with Maya, despite her protests and learns the meaning of consent.

episodes.name: #NotOkay
episodes.overview: Maya takes a stand when she experiences sexist micro-aggressions at a gig. Tristan pursues a new romance with Vijay, a grade ten student who idolizes him.

episodes.name: #ButThatsNoneOfMyBusiness
episodes.overview: Miles turns to anti-anxiety meds when forced to spend time with his dad. Maya becomes a feminist while protesting against unequal bathroom rights.

episodes.name: #NotAllMen
episodes.overview: Worried that no one will accept her for being gay, Zoe sets out to find someone who will. When Hunter’s Gamer Club is shut down because of misogynistic content, Hunter fights back.

episodes.name: #ThisCouldBeUsButYouPlayin
episodes.overview: Miles wakes up in a park and realizes he needs serious help. Maya’s turned down by a New York music producer and wonders if she’s messed up her one big chance.

episodes.name: #TeamFollowBack
episodes.overview: Tristan is forced to confront the many boys he’s hooked up with when Zoe internet diagnoses him with Chlamydia. Frankie’s friends try to convince her she belongs with Winston but her heart lies with someone else.

episodes.name: #SinceWeBeinHonest
episodes.overview: Zig discovers who’s responsible for Maya’s trolling, but is blackmailed into staying silent. After a cry for help from Esme, Miles falls back into a downwards spiral.

episodes.name: #SorryNotSorry
episodes.overview: When Hunter refuses to apologize for his online behaviour, he loses his friends’ support, and lashes out at the Snowball. Maya contemplates whether or not she can take back Zig.

episodes.name: #‎SquadGoals‬
episodes.overview: After a rival school pranks Degrassi, Frankie retaliates and is called out. When Hunter purposely endangers himself, Miles realises that he needs help. Maya's feelings for Zig threaten her co-op placement opportunity.

episodes.name: #TurntUp
episodes.overview: Hunter realises he must accept professional help. Shay considers whether or not she can defend Frankie. Angry, Zig blames Maya for everything that happened between them.

episodes.name: #‎CheckYourPrivilege
episodes.overview: Frankie organises a diversity mixer to fix things with Northern Tech. Tristan is worried about pressuring Miles and straining their relationship. Yael's app goes viral, & she has to choose between her integrity & her success.

episodes.name: #‎BuyMePizza‬
episodes.overview: When Zoe doesn't receive a call back, she comes up with a way to hide her true self. Grace is made fun of and decides to make a change. When Tiny asks Lola to delete her dating profile, she makes a very bold decision.

episodes.name: #ThrowBackThursday
episodes.overview: Lola stages a protest for Tiny's unfair suspension and garners attention during the Degrassi Alumni event. Tristan sets out to alleviate tension in the air by censoring all gala night sketches.

episodes.name: #ToMyFutureSelf
episodes.overview: Shay is given the opportunity of a lifetime, but must apologize for the protest & compromise her values in order to get it. When Grace begins spending more time with Zig, Maya decides to pursue a friendship with Peter.

episodes.name: #ThatAwkwardMomentWhen
episodes.overview: Frankie tries to escape from her problems by driving off with Jonah, but soon realises that running away isn’t always a solution. A suffering Tiny takes Shay’s advice over Lola’s.

episodes.name: #RiseAndGrind
episodes.overview: When Maya asks Vijay to take down his cover of her song, he responds online, and his fans blow up at her. When a dancing opportunity presents itself to Zig, he’s eager to prove himself and turns to Esme for help.

episodes.name: #TheseAreMyConfessions
episodes.overview: Grace confesses to having feelings for Zig during a party in the woods. To win Volleyball City Finals, Shay realises that they need Frankie, but wonders if she can forgive her.

episodes.name: #OMFG
episodes.overview: Lola shuts down Shay’s request to date Tiny, which leads Shay to act out during their championship game. Zoe’s burning intensifies & as Winston begins to second-guess their relationship, she finally gives in to her true self.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The Hollingsworth family must deal with the aftermath of the events of Degrassi’s Snow Ball that saw students forced into a school lockdown. Meanwhile, friendly pranking takes a very bad turn after the Degrassi girls volleyball team retaliates and goes too far against the rival team from Northern Tech. Also, favourite Degrassi alum are back and Student Body President Tristan will do whatever it takes to make the celebration an unforgettable one.

episodes.name: #BreakTheInternet
episodes.overview: Degrassi is giving a warm welcome to an influx of Syrian refugees and a spiteful Lola posts a controversial photo.

episodes.name: #IWokeUpLikeThis
episodes.overview: The Gamers are determined to make their vlog a success. Maya discovers an interest in 'tragedy porn'. Esme tests Zig's limits on how far is too far to go at school.

episodes.name: #WorstGiftEver
episodes.overview: Jonah and Grace pitch the Student Council on a play about the Degrassi bus accident. Goldi has questions about what it really means to be Muslim.

episodes.name: #PicsOrItDidntHappen
episodes.overview: Maya meets Saad, who shares a mutual interest in the dark side. Frankie feels that Jonah is hiding something.

episodes.name: #HugeIfTrue
episodes.overview: Shay, Lola and Frankie cozy up for girl's night until it becomes...less cozy. Is Frankie ready for more intimacy and will Shay's insecurities put her own relationship in jeopardy?

episodes.name: #ThatFeelingWhen
episodes.overview: Frankie is driving herself crazy over Jonah. Miles and Lola work on the play, together experiencing an emotional roller coaster. Zoe and Rasha are also taking a kind of thrill ride.

episodes.name: #Unsubscribe
episodes.overview: Zoe and Rasha are determined to make it work, even if it means keeping secrets. Grace is faced with a life and death decision and needs a friend.

episodes.name: #IRegretNothing
episodes.overview: Lola's friends are not there for her. If Tristan makes it to the play, will Miles' indiscretions be revealed? Maya's obsession with death is getting out of control.

episodes.name: #Woke
episodes.overview: Maya can't deal with her depression. Frankie and Jonah are trying to figure things out. It's Ms. Rivas' wedding and Zoe violates her mother's wishes and brings Rasha anyway.

episodes.name: #ImSleep
episodes.overview: Everyone loves it but Tristan clearly senses the truth. Maya appears to be happier... but appearances can be deceiving. Opening night and the play receives rave reviews.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The season begins revealing the outcome of the devastating bus crash – many are injured and one student is left in critical condition. Degrassi opens its doors to an influx of Syrian refugees, but when some unexpected tensions arise, so do the student politics. Meanwhile, a post on Hastygram sparks a debate about social media etiquette and what is, or isn’t, appropriate to share publically.

episodes.name: #BackToReality
episodes.overview: Grace and Jonah keep their relationship on the DL. Tristan starts back slowly at school. Esme is willing to do whatever it takes to keep her man.

episodes.name: #GetMoney
episodes.overview: Frankie is uploading some questionable posts on her socials so Esme encourages her re-curate her online persona. Shay is determined to up her game to get scouted.

episodes.name: #ILookLikeA
episodes.overview: Goldi has been flirting with Winston and doesn't even know it. Miles questions a post-grad opportunity that seems too good to be true.

episodes.name: #RollUpToTheClubLike
episodes.overview: After a terrorist attack in Brussels, the Muslim students at Degrassi find themselves in some very heated situations. Grace creates a bucket list.

episodes.name: #Preach
episodes.overview: Saad is torn between his own beliefs and the students' collective show of solidarity for Brussels. Frankie wonders if hanging with Esme and Zig is really good for her.

episodes.name: #FactsOnly
episodes.overview: Yael feels like an identity overhaul is needed and turns to Lola for help. Maya auditions for Zoe, Goldi and special celebrity judge for the charity talent show.

episodes.name: #Fire
episodes.overview: What starts out as a small grad camping getaway with Zig, Tiny, Jonah, Grace and Maya turns into a bigger ordeal when Frankie, Esme, Shay and Lola latch on.

episodes.name: #GetYouAManThatCanDoBoth
episodes.overview: Tristan and others wonder if his turbo-mode recovery is a good idea. After seeing others get "promposals,'' Shay is hoping that Tiny will do the same.

episodes.name: #Obsessed
episodes.overview: The senior prom is delayed due to a code red emergency. Esme is furious when prom doesn't go exactly as she'd hoped.

episodes.name: #KThxBye
episodes.overview: The gowns are on and the caps are about to be thrown, it's another Degrassi graduation. Zoe wonders how much support she'll get as she prepares to make her valedictory speech.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: The students return to school from their winter break, many for their final semester. Still reeling from the reality of Maya’s accident, Degrassi Community School is carefully monitoring everyone’s mental health and ensuring that all students have someone to talk to.
